dc_title_s: Superimposed magnetic on gravity anomaly map of southwest Minnesota, M-122
dc_description_s: Gravity (interpretation of gravity data collected with ground based meters indicating differences in rock density of rocks in the upper crust) and magnetic anomaly (interpretation of magnetic data collected from airborne surveys, the map contours (lines of equal magnetic intensity) indicate the distribution and concentration of magnetic minerals (primarily iron-bearing) within the upper crust of the earth) map of southwestern Minnesota, scale 1:250,000.
